thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: FF
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by FF

author: FF
title: FF
text: I wish I'd got the name of the sales assistant - a young girl who was very helpful. I needed runners and I have a smaller shoe size than average with few suitable sizes available in the store. She got me a few runners to try so I could check the size. She then offered to find a suitable pair in a colour I liked online. I had a choice of home or shop delivery. I chose the store and runners were delivered within 24 hours.
